plot: A secret society of bartenders seeks revenge on Homer and his friends when Moe breaks their most sacred rule.

Bart wins a rare brand of tequila from a Mexican TV show, he starts showing off his crystal skull brand tequila in order to aggravate and spite Homer even further. Homer soon gets revenge on Bart by stealing the rare tequila while he is sleeping. Homer shares the tequila with his friends and Moe. Homer and his friends end up causing a ruckus throughout town, but Moe has violated a sacred rule. Homer and his friends are injected with sober shots to prevent them from drinking. Homer and his friends sobriety has changed their lives for the better, but their punishment is over. Lenny, Carl, and Barney are allowed to drink again after receiving the antidote, but Homer refuses to drink and he heads home. The bartenders soon chase Homer so they can inject him with the antidote. Meanwhile, Bart, Lisa, and Maggie discover the broken tequila skull. They become shocked that the skull has reassembled itself. Causing Lisa, Bart, and Maggie run to away in terror.—dawsonpersi
